item.title: General store!
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

dont overcomplicate in shops.cfg theres a line that looks like
shop = 11 tab shopname tab tab 2 tab 2 other nonimportant stuff to my point
make the 2 tab 2
0 tab 1
this works on my server try it and if it dosent work play with the numbers the 0 tab 1
numbers are 0-2 a combination of 2 of the right numbers 0-2 will make your shop general store

	case 11: // Shop Case
		//isGeneral = true;
		p.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ff0000>^^I Buy AnyThing!^^", 620, 22);

		items = GameEngine.shops.pure;
		itemsN = GameEngine.shops.pureN;
		p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 64209, 93, p.getInventory().getContainer());//Shop Inventory
